article_title: Major automakers Toyota, Honda, FCA extend factory closures
article_description: Toyota  Honda and Fiat Chrysler Automobiles will not reopen North American factories at the end of the month as planned as the COVID 19 disease spreads and dampens demand for new cars  trucks and SUVs  FCA said Thursday that plants across the U S  and Canada
